title: Roasted Peppers in Oil (Peperoni Arrostiti Sotto Olio)

Ingredients.6: 5 leaves fresh basil leaves, finely sliced

Directions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate. Reduce grill heat to medium.

Directions.2: Grill whole red, yellow, and orange bell peppers on the preheated grill until charred on all sides, turning about every 5 minutes. Place charred peppers in a resealable plastic bag and seal well. Allow peppers to cool in the bag.

Directions.3: Combine olive oil, garlic, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper in a 1-pint glass jar (or larger, depending on size of peppers).

Directions.4: Remove cooled peppers from the bag and scrape off charred skins. Cut peppers in half; remove seeds and stems. Slice peppers into long strips and place in oil mixture. Mix well, ensuring peppers are covered in oil.

Directions.5: Serve, storing leftover peppers in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
